title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services       A cooperating association sales outlet run by Western National Parks and Monuments Association is operated at the site and offers books, historic souvenirs, an audio visual selection and logo merchandise (tshirts, totebags, hats, pins, patches, magnets, decals, and hiking stick medallions) Several antique and gift shops are located nearby in downtown Fort Scott and other retail establishments abound elsewhere in town For a listing, follow the link below. Antique and Gift Shops and Stores
